channel.title: Van Seleem Frequencies
channel.itunes:author: Van Seleem
channel.itunes:summary: From Trance to House, Progressive, and everything in between, this show transcends boundaries, offering a unique experience for dance music enthusiasts everywhere. Crafted and unleashed by Van Seleem.
channel.description: From Trance to House, Progressive, and everything in between, this show transcends boundaries, offering a unique experience for dance music enthusiasts everywhere. Crafted and unleashed by Van Seleem.

item.itunes:title: Echoes Of The Heart
item.title: Echoes Of The Heart
item.itunes:author: Van Seleem
item.itunes:summary: Experience a mesmerizing journey through the golden era of trance music. This episode features carefully selected classics that defined the genre, bringing back the pure essence of trance's emotional core.
item.content:encoded:
A Timeless Journey Through Classic Trance

Experience a mesmerizing journey through the golden era of trance music. This episode features carefully selected classics that defined the genre, bringing back the pure essence of trance's emotional core.

item.itunes:title: Sonic Mirage
item.title: Sonic Mirage
item.itunes:author: Van Seleem
item.description: Melodic And Progressive House Lovers, This Is For You!
item.itunes:summary: Dive into a carefully crafted selection of melodic and progressive house tracks. This episode takes you on a journey through lush soundscapes and driving rhythms that define the modern progressive house scene.
item.content:encoded:
Melodic And Progressive House Lovers, This Is For You!

Dive into a carefully crafted selection of melodic and progressive house tracks. This episode takes you on a journey through lush soundscapes and driving rhythms that define the modern progressive house scene.

item.itunes:title: Euphoria Rising
item.title: Euphoria Rising
item.itunes:author: Van Seleem
item.description: Bringing You the Finest Vocal House Bangers.
item.itunes:summary: Get ready for an uplifting journey through the best of vocal house music. This episode showcases powerful vocals combined with energetic beats that will lift your spirits and move your feet.
item.content:encoded:
Bringing You the Finest Vocal House Bangers.

Get ready for an uplifting journey through the best of vocal house music. This episode showcases powerful vocals combined with energetic beats that will lift your spirits and move your feet.

item.itunes:title: Tranceology
item.title: Tranceology
item.itunes:author: Van Seleem
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to Tranceology, where emotional melodies merge with powerful beats. This episode explores the cutting edge of modern trance music while paying homage to the genre's timeless elements.
item.content:encoded:
Tranceology, Where Emotion Meets the Beat.

Welcome to Tranceology, where emotional melodies merge with powerful beats. This episode explores the cutting edge of modern trance music while paying homage to the genre's timeless elements.
